channel.title: How to make Ancient teleport gfx 100% Fking easy

item.title: How to make Ancient teleport gfx 100% Fking easy
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

Hello ive made a tut for 100% ancient gfxs
This works on Devo,Delta,Maybe on czar

Video:
Comming soon

Open client.java and search for:

if (tStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis()-tTime >=

You see something like this

      if (tStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis()-tTime >= 2200) {
      toX = tX;
      toY = tY;
      heightLevel = tH;
      updateRequired = true;
      appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
      tStage = 0;
      tTime = 0;
      resetAnimation();
      resetfollowers();
      closeInterface();
      delItem1 = -1;
      delAmount1 = -1;
      delItem2 = -1;
      delAmount2 = -1;
      delItem3 = -1;
      delAmount3 = -1;
    }

Simple replace that code with this one

      if (tStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis()-tTime >= 2200) {
      toX = tX;
      toY = tY;
      lowGFX(455, 0);
      heightLevel = tH;
      updateRequired = true;
      appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
      tStage = 0;
      tTime = 0;
      resetAnimation();
      resetfollowers();
      closeInterface();
      delItem1 = -1;
      delAmount1 = -1;
      delItem2 = -1;
      delAmount2 = -1;
      delItem3 = -1;
      delAmount3 = -1;
    }

Save and compile Done,
Post any errors

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Ancient teleport gfx 100% Fking easy
